nodes.bodyText: Do you agree that "spaceIds" sounds better than "spaces" since List spaces holds only ids?
I know that this is an old code but can we rename to spaceEventsToBeDeleted, I think it sounds a bit better.
If you agree with the previous comment maybe rename this method to deleteBySpaceIds.
Could be replaced by this one-liner: int deletedFiles = IntStream.of(batchResult).sum();
If this method throws an exception, some files for spaces will not be deleted. Do you think it is worth wrapping it into a try-catch?
Can you extract these messages in constants?
